summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of GrowthxAILabs website. All requested features tested successfully including Home page with hero/services/products sections, Careers page with all sections, Pricing page with toggle/FAQ functionality, navigation between pages, and mobile responsiveness.
passed_tests: Home page loads with hero section, services (3 cards), products (3 cards), and CTA buttons
Navigation links work correctly between Home, Careers, and Pricing pages
Careers page loads with all sections: Hero with 'we are hiring' badge, Mission section, Tech Stack, Ideal Candidate, Open Positions, Interview Process
Pricing page loads with Hero, 5 pricing cards (Free/Core/Pro/Teams/Enterprise), comparison table, FAQ accordion
Monthly/Annual billing toggle works correctly (default monthly, switches to annual)
All buttons and links have proper data-testid attributes and are clickable
Navigation is responsive - mobile menu opens and works correctly
Footer displays correctly on all pages
Dark theme (#0f0f10) and gradient styling implemented correctly
Professional layout with proper spacing and typography
